messages.message: Can a user move a subspace created in one Instabase instance / environment - to another one? ( ithought no - but thought I would check)

I don’t think you can move the subspace, but you could mount the same filesystem across 2 different environments. Not sure if this is recommended though, as some data (like flow outputs) are stored in the db, and that wouldn’t be on the other instance. Would be great if someone could confirm the recommendation here.
nope, you cannot move a subspace across different instabase instances. You can only move subspaces within an instance.
do we have any recommendations on how they can move any of the folders or datas across? LIke zip and download or soemthing? or just a hard no
how much are they trying to move and what are the contents? and is it mostly input data or output results of flows?

like Lee mentioned, they can mount the file-system drive that hosts the files into different environments, but the existing folder structure will be different and if the files are our files (generated by us). they won’t necessarily make sense in the new path
